text: Robert Tomlinson was an English professional footballer who played as an outside forward in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Castleford Town and Harrogate. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Sportspeople from Castleford Category:Year of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Castleford Town F.C. players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bob Tomlinson
